section.15: The Chapters On Judgements From The Messenger of Allah

hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Bara':"My maternal uncle Abu Burdah Ibn Niyar passed by me and he had a flag with him. I said: 'Where are you going ?' He said: 'the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) dispatched me to a man who married a woman his father had married to: that I should bring him his head
